extendedInfo.description: Cinemark is a leader in the motion picture exhibition industry. The Cinemark Theatres app allows easy access to any domestic Cinemark theatre. The simple, user-friendly interface allows you to:â¢ Find Cinemark theatre locations via GPSâ¢ Search for your preferred Cinemark theatre locationâ¢ Access your My Cinemark favorite theatresâ¢ Purchase movie tickets securelyâ¢ View your gift card balanceâ¢ View ticket purchase historyCineMode Rewards:â¢ The Cinemark App now features CineMode - an exclusive and interactive way to earn Cinemark Rewards while being courteous during the showâ¢ From within the Cinemark app, start CineMode when your movie beginsâ¢ Your phone's screen will dim automatically, and you will be prompted to set volume to vibrateâ¢ Stay in CineMode for the duration of the movieâ¢ To ensure you receive your Reward, be sure to not use your phone at all when in CineMode. Hitting the "home" button will stop CineMode and you will not receive your Reward.â¢ Earn Rewards each and every time you see a movie at Cinemark!Youâll also be able to search and view:â¢ Search for movies Coming Soonâ¢ Search for movies Now Playingâ¢ View movie trailersâ¢ Rating, Synopsis, Cast and moreâ¦â¢ Get information for the films you want to see!Stay Social:â¢ Share showtimes via email, text, Facebook or Twitterâ¢ Share theatre locations via email, text, Facebook or Twitterâ¢ Share movie info via email, text, Facebook or TwitterKeep the Best Seat In Town at your fingertips to access showtimes, movie info and Cinemark theatre locations on the go. Download the FREE Cinemark Theatres app now!

reviews.title: Broken
reviews.comment: Fails to let me see Showtimes and buy tickets when I select a show at a specified theater. Please fix. -LG lucid
reviews.author: Nate Lords

reviews.title: Stopped working
reviews.comment: It seems with evey update this app gets worse. It used to work and I woould get my free stuff. Now the app won\'t even open. It will just sit in its loading screen. Don\'t waste your time with this app.
reviews.author: David Adams

reviews.title: Works great.....
reviews.comment: Cinemode is fantastic....always works.  One addition that would be great though is the ability to purchase tickets for reserved seating theaters.  In my area all of them are reserved so it would be great if the app was updated to accomodate that.
reviews.author: Heather Dahle

reviews.title: If it stops working
reviews.comment: Even though I don\'t use my phone after turning Cinemode on, it keeps turning itself off. The first three times I don\'t know why but the last time might be because I received a phone call and/or my calendar notification pushed. Sent e-mail to support.  Response: If the home button is touched during this time it will error the results of Cinemode.  *Note sometimes there are signal errors that occur and this can skew your reward. Please just notify us and we will correct. [They did!]
reviews.author: Ashley S. MacKenzie

reviews.title: useful but slow!
reviews.comment: app does have useful features but is terribly slow! even sitting right next to my wifi router can take several minutes to load the next screen or allow me to change selections or filters
reviews.author: Micah Wells

reviews.title: Sucks! Don\'t bother!
reviews.comment: Really, listen to all the reviews. This app sucks. Never works, always freezing and saying unable to process rewards. Even the employees warn you to begin the app before entering the theater. Yet no one is accountable for it not working. Worst reward system EVER!!!
reviews.author: Marcus Howard

reviews.title: Charge money to buy tickets?
reviews.comment: As a frequent movie goer I always join the frequent flyer program for the local theater to earn points.  Cinemark charges 3 dollars to buy tickets to earn points.  What a rip off and what a waste of an app.
reviews.author: Robert Peladeau

reviews.title: God awful!
reviews.comment: Why make an app and not be able to buy tickets? Been 6 months no fix? Says no showtimes available.
reviews.author: Butch Fay

reviews.title: Cinemode is junk
reviews.comment: I have tried it for times with only one time working. It almost seems like you have to put it in airplane mode to make the stupid thing work. App needs a lot of work. This runs like a beta version.
reviews.author: Steve Hung

reviews.comment: Uninstalling. Didn\'t get my rewards for using cine mode. I used it twice as directed and didn\'t get any points or rewards even after silencing the phone during the entire movie with the cine mode app. Completely useless.
reviews.author: Gotwin van Santen Alix

reviews.title: Slow, not working well
reviews.comment: The app used to work well. Now, it won\'t load well, keeps spinning showing it is loading but doesn\'t or it won\'t go to the info I am trying to find. I finally give up! :(
reviews.author: Ronda Aufill

reviews.title: Fix Cinemode!
reviews.comment: This app used to work. And it worked well. Now everytime I try cinemode, it doesnt work. I dont realize this til after the movie. Cinemode stops and I dont ever get my reward anymore.
reviews.author: Michelle Hicks

reviews.title: Broken
reviews.comment: Show times are never shown, nor are the theatres around me. This app has so many problems its not even funny. Waste of time and space.
reviews.author: Coletyn Boyd

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: App will say movies are sold out but when you go to the web sit there are plenty of seats please fix
reviews.author: Peter King

reviews.title: Piece of crap
reviews.comment: I been trying to use this app for awhile to get rewards .. We have been to about 8 movies and I use Cinemode everytime but it always freezes and I can never turn it off after movie to get reward. FIX IT or get rid of it. Im going to start going to a different theatre that has an app that works.
reviews.author: brad taylor

reviews.title: Great App!!!!
reviews.comment: I like all the information on this application. It makes it easy to find movie theaters to see what\'s playing in theaters. It  also lets me see all the coming out soon movies.
reviews.author: Amir Kashif

reviews.title: QR codes fail on S3
reviews.comment: The QR code for ticket purchases or rewards do not work with the QR code scanners at the local Cinemark.\302\240 This happens every time time I purchase a ticket or attempt to use rewards.\302\240 The ticket purchases were valid, but the person inside the booth has to manually enter the numerical code.\302\240 The same goes for the rewards when I use them at the concession stands.\302\240 On the other hand, the QR codes for ticket purchases through the Fandango app scan without issues at the same local Cinemark. Why is that???
reviews.author: Hector Guzman

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on any of my devices
reviews.comment: This app, like others have said, gets worse with every update. On my tablet it won\'t scroll thru movies or theaters it just stays still, then if it does scroll for a second it just jumps back to the top. On my phone cinemode is a joke. If I turn it on but get any type of activity on my phone it goes out of it, if I turn it in a moment too soon it doesn\'t give me my reward, and mist of the time it just freezes and I have to reset my phone so it doesn\'t give a reward.  Start listening and start fixing this piece of crap app!
reviews.author: Kristi Hardy

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: It will not work on my Galaxy S4 or my husband\'s HTC. Please fix!
reviews.author: Sadie H\303\251bert
